sentence: In 2019, Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) called Orban a "patriot" who "demonstrates the values of Western civilization and democracy, sovereignty, and self-determination."
author: Emily Singer
title: Greene Praises Authoritarian Orban After Election Win In Hungary

sentence: Rep. Paul Gosar has once again brought national attention to a far-right group and its efforts with his name dangled as a participant, only to be later disavowed.
author: Ronald J. Hansen
title: Rep. Paul Gosar promotes, then disavows, extremist group's event
